timeline.bodyText: getBillingAccounts() returns null for no results, not empty list
timeline.author: jmthibault79
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,7 +155,8 @@ private BillingAccount freeTierBillingAccount() {
     List<BillingAccount> billingAccounts =
         Stream.concat(
                 Stream.of(freeTierBillingAccount()),
-                response.getBillingAccounts().stream()
+                Optional.ofNullable(response.getBillingAccounts()).orElse(Collections.emptyList())
